## canvas2D variable

Similar to [canvasWebGL](./hdom-components.canvaswebgl.md)<!-- -->, but targets default 2D drawing context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canvas2D: (handlers: Partial<CanvasHandlers<CanvasRenderingContext2D>>, opts?: Canvas2DContextAttributes | undefined) => {
    init(_el: HTMLCanvasElement, hctx: any, ...args: any[]): void;
    render(hctx: any, ...args: any[]): any[];
    release(hctx: any, ...args: any[]): void;
}
```
